text:
Artist: Vincent van Gogh
Description: Dutch painter (1853–1890)

Born: 1853-03-30T00:00:00Z
Died: 1890-07-29T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Kingdom of the Netherlands

Movements: Expressionism, Post-impressionism
Genres: interior view, self-portrait, cityscape, portrait, landscape painting, still life, Christian art
Occupations: painter, printmaker, draftsperson
Fields: art of painting

Influenced By: Anton Mauve, Paul Gauguin, Paul Cézanne, Jean-François Millet, Katsushika Hokusai, Willem Roelofs, Peter Paul Rubens
Notable Works: The Starry Night, The Potato Eaters

Artist: Johannes Vermeer
Description: Dutch painter (1632–1675)

Born: 1632-10-01T00:00:00Z
Died: 1675-01-01T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Dutch Republic

Movements: Baroque painting, Dutch Golden Age painting
Genres: cityscape, genre painting, portrait
Occupations: painter, art dealer, art collector
Fields: art of painting

Influenced By: Gabriel Metsu, Dirck van Baburen, Carel Fabritius, Leonaert Bramer
Notable Works: Diana and her Nymphs, The Milkmaid, View of Delft, The Geographer, The Astronomer, Girl with a Pearl Earring, The Procuress

Artist: Frans Hals
Description: Dutch painter (1580—1666)

Born: 1582-01-01T00:00:00Z
Died: 1666-08-26T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Dutch Republic

Movements: Baroque, Dutch Golden Age painting
Genres: portrait painting, genre painting, schutterstuk
Occupations: visual artist, painter, printmaker, architectural draftsperson
Fields: Unknown

Influenced By: Unknown
Notable Works: A Militiaman Holding a Berkemeyer, Known as the ‘Merry Drinker’, Regents of the Old Men's Almshouse, Young Man and Woman in an Inn, Willem van Heythuysen posing with a sword, Portrait of a young man with a skull, Portrait of Dorothea Berck, Regentesses of the Old Men's Alms House, Portrait of Isaak Abrahamsz. Massa, Malle Babbe, The Banquet of the Officers of the St George Militia Company in 1616, Laughing boy, Merrymakers at Shrovetide, Militia Company of District XI under the Command of Captain Reynier Reael, The Officers of the St George Militia Company in 1639, The Officers of the St Adrian Militia Company in 1633, Laughing Cavalier, Two laughing boys with mug of beer, Peeckelhaeringh, Jester with lute

Artist: Gerard ter Borch
Description: Dutch Golden Age painter (1617–1681)

Born: 1617-01-01T00:00:00Z
Died: 1681-12-08T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Dutch Republic

Movements: Baroque
Genres: genre painting, genre art
Occupations: visual artist, painter
Fields: Unknown

Influenced By: Unknown
Notable Works: The messenger, Portrait of Helena van der Schalcke, The Gallant Conversation, known as Paternal Admonition

Artist: Otto Wacker
Description: German art dealer who became infamous for commissioning and selling forgeries of paintings by Vincent van Gogh (1898-1970)

Born: 1898-08-11T00:00:00Z
Died: 1970-10-13T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Germany

Movements: Unknown
Genres: Unknown
Occupations: art historian, art dealer, art forger
Fields: Unknown

Influenced By: Unknown
Notable Works: Unknown

Artist: Han van Meegeren
Description: Dutch painter and art forger (1889-1947)

Born: 1889-10-10T00:00:00Z
Died: 1947-12-30T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Kingdom of the Netherlands

Movements: Unknown
Genres: landscape painting
Occupations: copyist, collector, art forger, watercolorist, painter, restorer, counterfeiter, draftsperson
Fields: young adult literature, art of painting

Influenced By: Unknown
Notable Works: Woman reading music, Cisterspelende vrouw, The foot washing
